title: Sound Bath - Crystal Fusion Meditation
description: Sound Bath - Crystal Fusion Meditation Hosted By Middlesex School of Complementary Medicine. Event starts on Tuesday, 12 December 2023 and happening at Middlesex School of Complementary Medicine, Harrow, EN. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Tue Dec 12 2023 at 07:00 pm to 09:00 pm (GMT+00:00) Middlesex School of Complementary Medicine, 136 Vaughan Road, Harrow, United Kingdom We are the Middlesex School of Complementary Medicine (also known as MSCM) and we invite you to our blissful Sound Bath - Crystal Fusion Meditation.Take a moment to breathe. Take a moment to be present. Take a moment to feel the calm.The powerful fusion of sound healing, crystal healing and meditation provide a sensory thread which will gently steer you through a meditative experience - one of the most effective ways to rejuvenate mind and body. Our unique Immersive Sound Bath fused with crystal healing give you a chance to truly rest, heal, receive, and connect with your deeper self. Using a wide variety of ancient sound healing instruments including a Gong, Tibetan bowls, Crystal Bowl, Shamanic drum, Ocean Drum, Koshi Winchimes, Tibetan Bells, Rain sticks, Tuning Forks, Healing Chimes, Tubular chimes, a variety of percussion instruments and more you will be immersed in beautiful sounds that are healing to your body, mind and soul, leaving you grounded, centred and deeply relaxed. The sound bath will lull you into a peaceful, relaxed and mindful state of being, while your body feels the power of the crystal energies. Please visit our website for more information: [https://mscm.co.uk/events/sound-bath-crystal-fusion-meditation/](https://mscm.co.uk/events/sound-bath-crystal-fusion-meditation/) Also check out other [Health & Wellness Events in Harrow](https://allevents.in/harrow/health-wellness?ref=ep_desc_also). Tickets for Sound Bath - Crystal Fusion Meditation can be booked here. |Ticket Information||Ticket Price| |Sound Bath - Crystal Fusion Meditation||GBP 14| Stay tuned with the most relevant events happening around you. Attend, Share & Influence! E.g. Jack is first name and Mandanka is last name.
